database

Class SQLiteInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseInterface
      • database.SQLiteInterface

  • public class SQLiteInterface
extends DatabaseInterface
    Important class which queries the database for login, map, and statistics. Acts as interface between the database and rest of the program.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class database.DatabaseInterface
